pkgmetadata.longdescription: Distribution-Free Tests of Non-Nested Models // Implementation of Clarke's distribution-free test of non-nested models. Currently supported model functions are: lm(), glm() ('binomial', 'poisson', 'negative binomial' links), polr() ('MASS'), clm() ('ordinal'), and multinom() ('nnet'). For more information on the test, see Clarke (2007) doi:10.1093/pan/mpm004.
